canvas.dropFlowDescription: Select a JSON file containing a space configuration
canvas.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

apiCodeDialog.cannotUseApiKey: You cannot use API key while embedding/sharing chatbot.
apiCodeDialog.selectNoAuthorization: Please select "No Authorization" from the dropdown at the top right corner.
apiCodeDialog.overrideConfigDescription: You can override existing input configuration of the space with overrideConfig property.
apiCodeDialog.securityNote: For security reason, override config is disabled by default. You can change this by going into Space Configuration -> Security tab, and enable the property you want to override.
apiCodeDialog.multipleValuesNote: You can also specify multiple values for a config parameter by specifying the node id
apiCodeDialog.streamingNote: on how to stream response back to application

displaySettings.title: Display Settings
displaySettings.description: Choose how your bot should be displayed - as a standard chat or as an AR experience

displaySettings.arModeDescription: Interactive AR experience with 3D models and visual elements
